title: LEGO Stunt Rally
description:
LEGO Stunt Rally offers the opportunity to compete in high speed races and
perform over-the-top tricks in a virtual world made of colorful plastic building
blocks. Players design their own tracks in one of four different environments,
all of which are based on actual LEGO play sets. In addition to lots of
loop-de-loops and hairpin turns, special stunt pieces are available to add an
extra dimension of strategy and action to track design and stunt racing.
Additional stunt pieces become available as the player progresses through the
game. LEGO Stunt Rally features 21 levels of play and six whimsical vehicles.
